name: Axel Springer SE
goal: Axel Springer is an integrated multimedia company in Europe offering digital and print media. The company's strategy focuses on its core competences excellent journalism, marketing and classified ads. Its broad media portfolio encompasses established multimedia brand families such as POLITICO.EU, the BILD- and WELT-Groups.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Freedom of the press
Commercial communications
Advertising Self-regulation
Copyright and related rights
Media pluralism
Data protection
Electronic commerce
VAT harmonization
Environmental topics
Competition
